text: You work at a gaming startup that has several terabytes of structured data in Cloud Storage. This data includes gameplay time data, user metadata, and game metadata. You want to build a model that recommends new games to users that requires the least amount of coding. What should you do?

choices.text: Load the data in BigQuery. Use BigQuery ML to train an Autoencoder model.
Load the data in BigQuery. Use BigQuery ML to train a matrix factorization model.
Read data to a Vertex AI Workbench notebook. Use TensorFlow to train a two-tower model.
Read data to a Vertex AI Workbench notebook. Use TensorFlow to train a matrix factorization model.
